Text.Page:
Rhodos and his forces have already moved out.
Lead the supply troops and join up with them.

I will leave soon myself.
While the Federation was on the way to Arx Umbra, you retrieved the stolen supplies from the hand of the goblins and joined up with Rhodos.
Eh? <PCNAME>? What are you doing here?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Where are the soldiers?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

They just left! I thought you went with them.

My friend Deoric is their rear guard. Look for him to the north.

Some goblins asked for help, so the idiot driving the supply wagon stopped. That's when they attacked us. I took a nasty shot to my skull.

When I woke up, the wagon was gone. We have to get the supplies back.

(The wagon sits empty.)

(Footprints lead back up the slope.)

No crates at all?

They must have moved them while I was unconscious."Looks like they came back to the road."
Right. You should chase the supplies down. I'll catch up with you.

Excellent work getting these back.

I'll carry them from here. You catch up to the rest of the force.

We feared the worst when you didn't show up. It is fortunate that you caught up.

Rhodos asked us to hold this position and awaits at Domare Outpost.

It's not far from here, but be cautious. You're entering a zone of danger.

What have the archdevas done to this land? Look at the sky!

It's time to put an end to their infernal plot. Are you with me?
